title: Provides for a charge-back of refunds of taxes levied by a school district on behalf of a school district public library
summary: Provides that a school district which levies taxes on behalf of a school district public library may charge back to such public library the portion of any court ordered refund attributable to library purposes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to school districts which levy taxes on behalf of a school district and public library
